titleStmt.title: A reply to the Observator together with a sermon preached on the 24th of August last past, on Gal. 6. 2. at St. Giles in the Fields : most unjustly reflected upon by him / by William Smythies ...
titleStmt.author: Smythies, William, d. 1715.
